1.0.name: wordpress/page-management-dropdown
1.0.description:
Ideal for using WordPress as a CMS, Page Management Dropdown expands the Pages administration menu by adding a link to edit each of your individual pages.

Before Wordpress 2.7, this plugin had to be used in conjunction with another administration dropdown menu plugin. This is no longer the case.
